pkgmetadata.longdescription: Markov Chain Gaussian Fields Simulation and Parameter Estimation // Simulating and estimating (regime-switching) Markov chain Gaussian fields with covariance functions of the Gneiting class (Gneiting 2002) doi:10.1198/016214502760047113. It supports parameter estimation by weighted least squares and maximum likelihood methods, and produces Kriging forecasts and intervals for existing and new locations.
